<![CDATA[The Scotsman - News]]> Feed http://www.scotsman.com/news-2-6544 Copyright 2016, Johnston Press Plc http://www.scotsman.com/news-2-6544/swts-news-feed-1-65668 Fri, 13 May 2016 08:23:30 +0100 http://blogs.law.harvard.edu/tech/rss 60 <![CDATA[Tesco boss Dave Lewis rings up £2.9m annual bonus]]> http://www.scotsman.com/tesco-boss-dave-lewis-rings-up-2-9m-annual-bonus-1-4127045

Dave Lewis, the chief executive of Tesco, has been awarded an annual bonus of £2.9 million, taking his total pay for the year to £4.6m.

]]> 1.4127045 Fri, 13 May 2016 08:23:30 +0100 <![CDATA[Leaders: ‘Far-reaching reform’ of the BBC watered down]]> http://www.scotsman.com/leaders-far-reaching-reform-of-the-bbc-watered-down-1-4126863

]]> 1.4126907 Thu, 12 May 2016 23:04:33 +0100 <![CDATA[Prosecution of brothel keeper not dropped over Heath allegation]]> http://www.scotsman.com/prosecution-of-brothel-keeper-not-dropped-over-heath-allegation-1-4126905

]]> 1.4126905 Thu, 12 May 2016 23:01:13 +0100 <![CDATA[15-week-old boy killed after ‘being shaken in fit of anger’]]> http://www.scotsman.com/15-week-old-boy-killed-after-being-shaken-in-fit-of-anger-1-4126900

A man has admitted killing a 15-week old baby boy by shaking him in a fit of anger that caused fatal brain injuries.

]]> 1.4126900 Thu, 12 May 2016 22:56:56 +0100 <![CDATA[Pope Francis willing to consider Catholic women deacons]]> http://www.scotsman.com/pope-francis-willing-to-consider-catholic-women-deacons-1-4126896
